title: Edith Piaf
creator_credit: Triangle Productions, Theodora Olembert and Peter Graham
brief_description: A documentary on the life of the famous French singer. Highlights the pressures undergone by entertainers, such as the constant travel, drugs and alcohol and media attention. Narrated by Alan Badel
creator_credit_for_label: Triangle Productions, Theodora Olembert and Peter Graham
